text: Aur unn say unn ki qom ney hujjat kerna shuroo kiya aap ney farmaya kiya tum Allah kay moamlay mein mujh say hujjat kertay ho halankay uss ney mujhay tareeqa batla diya hai aur mein unn cheezon say jin ko tum Allah kay sath shareek banatay ho nahi darta haan agar mera perwerdigar hi koi amar chahaye mera perwerdigar her cheez ko apney ilm mein gheray huye hai kiya tum phir bhi khayal nahi kertay
